languages.text:
The Ministorum Priest deals +{uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} more damage and +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}% more {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} with bolt weapons. Base melta weapon and flamer damage is increased by +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}%.
Those bonuses are doubled against daemons, psykers, and xenos.
languages.original_text:
Поборник веры получает +{uip|ArmourBonus|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48}% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} против атак демонов и {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урона{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Решимость{/g} поборника веры также увеличена на {uip|ResolveBonus|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48}.

traits.locale_text:
The Ministorum Priest deals +{uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} more damage and +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}% more {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} with bolt weapons. Base melta weapon and flamer damage is increased by +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}%.
Those bonuses are doubled against daemons, psykers, and xenos.

The Ministorum Priest deals +{uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} more damage and +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}% more {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} with bolt weapons. Base melta weapon and flamer damage is increased by +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}%.
Those bonuses are doubled against daemons, psykers, and xenos.

The Ministorum priest gains +{uip|ArmourBonus|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48}% to {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armour{/g} against attacks of daemons and {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}.
The priest's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is also permanently increased by {uip|ResolveBonus|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48}.

The devotee gains +{uip|ArmourBonus|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48}% to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against attacks of daemons and {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}.
The devotee's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is also permanently increased by {uip|ResolveBonus|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48}.

With bolt weapons, the Ministorum Priest deals +{uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} more damage and +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}% more {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. Base melta weapons and flamers damage is increased by +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}%.
Those bonuses are doubled against daemons, psykers, and xenos.

languages.text:
Der Priester des Ministorum verursacht +{uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} mehr Schaden und +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} % höheren {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Schaden{/g} mit Boltwaffen. Der Basisschaden von Melterwaffen und Flammenwerfern erhöht sich um +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} %.
Diese Boni werden gegen Dämonen, Psioniker und Xenos verdoppelt.
languages.original_text:
The Ministorum Priest deals +{uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} more damage and +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}% more {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} with bolt weapons. Base melta weapon and flamer damage is increased by +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}%.
Those bonuses are doubled against daemons, psykers, and xenos.

traits.locale_text:
Der Priester des Ministorum erhält +{uip|ArmourBonus|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48}% auf die Rüstung gegen Angriffe von Dämonen und Warpschaden.
Die Entschlossenheit des Priesters wird außerdem dauerhaft um {uip|ResolveBonus|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} erhöht.

Der Priester des Ministorum verursacht +{uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} mehr Schaden und +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} % höheren {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Schaden{/g} mit Boltwaffen. Der Basisschaden von Melterwaffen und Flammenwerfern erhöht sich um +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} %.
Diese Boni werden gegen Dämonen, Psioniker und Xenos verdoppelt.

languages.text:
Le prêtre du Ministorum inflige +{uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} points de dégâts supplémentaires et +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g} avec les armes à bolts. Les dégâts de base des armes à fusion et lance-flammes sont augmentés de +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} %.
Ces bonus sont doublés contre les démons, les psykers et les xénos.
languages.original_text:
The Ministorum Priest deals +{uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} more damage and +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}% more {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} with bolt weapons. Base melta weapon and flamer damage is increased by +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}%.
Those bonuses are doubled against daemons, psykers, and xenos.

traits.locale_text:
Le prêtre du Ministorum inflige +{uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} points de dégâts supplémentaires et +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g} avec les armes à bolts. Les dégâts de base des armes à fusion et lance-flammes sont augmentés de +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} %.
Ces bonus sont doublés contre les démons, les psykers et les xénos.

Le prêtre du Ministorum bénéficie de +{uip|ArmourBonus|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} % d'armure contre les attaques de démons et les dégâts warp.
La détermination du prêtre augmente également de façon permanente de {uip|ResolveBonus|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48}.

languages.text:
国教牧师使用爆矢武器攻击时，造成的伤害提高{uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48}，{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}提高{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}%，热熔武器与火焰喷射器的基础伤害提高{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}%。
对抗恶魔、灵能者、异形时，此加成效果翻倍。
languages.original_text:
The Ministorum Priest deals +{uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} more damage and +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}% more {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} with bolt weapons. Base melta weapon and flamer damage is increased by +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}%.
Those bonuses are doubled against daemons, psykers, and xenos.

traits.locale_text:
国教牧师使用爆矢武器攻击时，造成的伤害提高{uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48}，{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}提高{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}%，热熔武器与火焰喷射器的基础伤害提高{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}%。
对抗恶魔、灵能者、异形时，此加成效果翻倍。

国教牧师受到恶魔攻击与亚空间伤害时，针对此次攻击护甲提高{uip|ArmourBonus|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48}%。
此外，牧师的决心也会永久提高{uip|ResolveBonus|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48}。

languages.text:
El sacerdote del Ministorum inflige +{uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} más de daño y +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} % más de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g} con armas bólter. El daño base de las armas de fusión y los lanzallamas aumenta un +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} %.
Estas bonificaciones se duplican contra daemons, psíquicos y xenos.
languages.original_text:
The Ministorum Priest deals +{uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} more damage and +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}% more {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} with bolt weapons. Base melta weapon and flamer damage is increased by +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}%.
Those bonuses are doubled against daemons, psykers, and xenos.

traits.locale_text:
El sacerdote del Ministorum inflige +{uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} más de daño y +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} % más de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g} con armas bólter. El daño base de las armas de fusión y los lanzallamas aumenta un +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} %.
Estas bonificaciones se duplican contra daemons, psíquicos y xenos.

El sacerdote del Ministorum gana un +{uip|ArmourBonus|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} % a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} contra ataques de daemons y de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g}.
La {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} del sacerdote también aumenta permanentemente en {uip|ResolveBonus|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48}.

El devoto gana +{uip|ArmourBonus|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} % a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} contra ataques de daemons y {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g}.
La {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} del devoto también aumenta permanentemente en {uip|ResolveBonus|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48}.

languages.text: 司祭はボルト武器で+{uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48}の追加ダメージと+{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}%の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}を与える。基礎のメルタ武器およびフレイマーのダメージは+{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}%増加する。これらのボーナスはデーモン、異能者、ゼノに対して2倍になる。
languages.original_text:
The Ministorum Priest deals +{uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} more damage and +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}% more {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} with bolt weapons. Base melta weapon and flamer damage is increased by +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}%.
Those bonuses are doubled against daemons, psykers, and xenos.

traits.locale_text:
信者はディーモンの攻撃と{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}ワープダメージ{/g}に対して、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}に+{uip|ArmourBonus|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48}%を得る。
信者の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}はさらに、永続的に{uip|ResolveBonus|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48}増加する。

ミニストルム・プリーストはディーモンの攻撃とワープダメージに対して、アーマーに+{uip|ArmourBonus|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48}%を得る。
プリーストの決断力はさらに、永続的に{uip|ResolveBonus|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48}増加する。

languages.text:
Священник Адептус Министорум наносит +{uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} дополнительного урона и на {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}% больше {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического урона{/g} при использовании болтерного оружия. Базовый урон мельта-оружия и огнеметов увеличивается на {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}%.
Эти бонусы удваиваются против демонов, псайкеров и ксеносов.
languages.original_text:
With bolt weapons, the Ministorum Priest deals +{uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} more damage and +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}% more {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. Base melta weapons and flamers damage is increased by +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}%.
Those bonuses are doubled against daemons, psykers, and xenos.

traits.locale_text:
Священник Адептус Министорум наносит +{uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} дополнительного урона и на {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}% больше {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического урона{/g} при использовании болтерного оружия. Базовый урон мельта-оружия и огнеметов увеличивается на{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}%.
Эти бонусы удваивается в бою против демонов, псайкеров и ксеносов.

Священник Адептус Министорум получает +<u>(4 × бонус ВОЛ)</u>% к броне против атак демонов и варп-урона.
Решимость священника также получает постоянный бонус <u>(бонус ВОЛ / 2)</u>.

Священник Адептус Министорум получает +{uip|ArmourBonus|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48}% к броне против атак демонов и варп-урона.
Решимость священника также получает постоянный бонус {uip|ResolveBonus|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48}.

Священник Адептус Министорум наносит +{uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} дополнительного урона и на {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}% больше {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического урона{/g} при использовании болтерного оружия. Базовый урон мельта-оружия и огнеметов увеличивается на{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}%.
Эти бонусы удваивается в бою против демонов, псайкеров и ксеносов.

Священник Адептус Министорум наносит +{uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} дополнительного урона и на {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}% больше {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического урона{/g} при использовании болтерного оружия. Базовый урон мельта-оружия и огнеметов увеличивается на {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}%.
Эти бонусы удваиваются против демонов, псайкеров и ксеносов.

languages.text:
Ministorum Rahibi, bulon silahlarıyla +{uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} daha fazla hasar ve +%{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik hasar{/g} verir. Taban melta silahı ve alevsaçan hasarı, +%{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} artar.
Bu bonuslar; iblis, ruhsezer ve zenolara karşı iki katına çıkar.
languages.original_text:
The Ministorum Priest deals +{uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} more damage and +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}% more {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} with bolt weapons. Base melta weapon and flamer damage is increased by +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}%.
Those bonuses are doubled against daemons, psykers, and xenos.

traits.locale_text:
Zahit, iblis saldırılarına ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}öteboyut hasarına{/g} karşı +%{uip|ArmourBonus|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} kadar {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} kazanır.
Zahidin {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} değeri de kalıcı olarak {uip|ResolveBonus|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} kadar artar.

Ministorum Rahibi, bulon silahlarıyla +{uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} daha fazla hasar ve +%{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik hasar{/g} verir. Taban melta silahı ve alevsaçan hasarı, +%{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} artar.
Bu bonuslar; iblis, ruhsezer ve zenolara karşı iki katına çıkar.

languages.text:
Add aditional damage by {uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} and increases critical damage by {uip|Value_2|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48}% for all bolter weapon.
Increases base damage and burn level from flamethrowers and base melt damage by {uip|Val_2|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48}%.
All bonus against demon,psyker and xenos have doubled.

traits.locale_text:
Add aditional damage by {uip|Value_1|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48} and increases critical damage by {uip|Value_2|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48}% for all bolter weapon.
Increases base damage and burn level from flamethrowers and base melt damage by {uip|Val_2|c5acfe1f0e02491cb86047de9b200e48}%.
All bonus against demon,psyker and xenos have doubled.
